message: The first time I knew she was the one was when she met Moonee. She walked into my apartment, heard a little puppy, and asked if I had a dog. I said yes, I have a puppy and immediately shoved me aside and wrnt one-on-one with his crate. She lost and I had to help her, of course. Once she had him in her arms she didnâ€™t let him go for the rest of the night. Thatâ€™s when I knew she was the girl for me. Anyone who shows that much love for a puppy she just met is someone pretty special
